bum.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: someone, especially a man, who has no home or job, and who asks people for money
bum.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: to ask someone for something such as money, food, or cigarettes
bum.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: She bummed a little cash off me.
bum.translation[2].definitions[0].exampl: The orchestra was excellent. No one played a bum note.
Jim got a bum deal  (=unfair treatment).
